root.name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
root.description: There Are Many Monsters In This Game Most Are In The List Below. Monsters: -Pteradactly Ghost -The Black Knight Ghost -The 10,000 Volt Ghost -Captain Cutler's Ghost -The Zombie -Miner 49er -The Tar Monster -Skeleton Men -The Cotten Candy Glob -And More
